channel.description: Access Control Lists (ACLs) Setting a default ACL on a directory allows content sharing among userâ€™s without having to modify access on each new file and subdirectory. Extra permissions that can be set on files and directories. Define permissions for named user and named groups. Configured the same way on both files and directories. Named Users May or may not be a part of the same group. 2 different groups of ACLs. Default ACLs and Access ACLs.
